nodes.text: The Lake Thorn, also known as Lake Bondoma, was a lake south-west the city of Nashal on the planet Talus. It was connected to several rivers, including the Aximia River. The Nashal River Race swoop racing circuit crossed this lake.
The Lake Bondoma is one of many designated planetary regions in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. However, it is identified as Lake Thorn during the Nashal River Race.
